title: What Shall We Do With Valuable Data Sets That The "Players" Will Make?
body:
After Users Browse Sav3 Social Media Platform , They will generate valuable data sets. We have seen the strength of platforms like Sand protocol , where you can stake money on data sets that are deemed wanted largely by organizations, Which is what creates a market for data and the value behind it.
#1 So We Propose that a second LP pool is created , one that in return for staking your LP token is voucher for the data within the stake that you are providing liquidity for, this will provide a growing wealth gainer , that is  breaking through the trend faze ,and becoming a real strategy for obtaining 24/7 wealth gains without day trading. 

#2 Secondly on a point regarding different aspects of the strategy: We also believe that with Sav3 becoming more , and more stable now would be the time for strong price pump before we we become complete "Rock-Solid" , We suggest a SAV3 AIRdrop , One that at the same time burn a percentage of each drop , creating a faster scarcity value Pump. If we airdrop sav3 to holders , while burning about 3.33% of each and every drop , As well as locking in 1.57% We estimate that we will reach a Higher valued stable coin.
choices: I Want To Hear Your Other Plan.
author: 0x76A0B891dA2637f15eD7b0B5A3E98885487EDc5E
